paper_abstract: In this paper we show that membership in finitely generated submonoids is undecidable for the free metabelian group of rank 2 and for the wreath product a"currency signa parts per thousand Euro(a"currency signxa"currency sign). We also show that subsemimodule membership is undecidable for finite rank free (a"currency signxa"currency sign)-modules. The proof involves an encoding of Turing machines via tilings. We also show that rational subset membership is undecidable for two-dimensional lamplighter groups.
paper_title: Tilings and Submonoids of Metabelian Groups
